Detailed Description

A custom Menu object which will generate the application menu based on a configuration XML file. \

 Parameters:
 * parent application
 * XML configuration file
 * icons directory path

Definition at line 24 of file menu.py.

It actually creates the Menu widgets

00088         """It actually creates the Menu widgets"""
00089         # first create the menu:
00090         for i in self.MenuTree: 
00091             self.menus[self.MenuTree.index(i)][0]=tkinter.Menu(self)   
00092             self.add_cascade(label=i[0], menu=self.menus[self.MenuTree.index(i)][0])
00093         
00094         # recursively add the rest of the menu widget in a similar structure with self.MenuTree
00095 
00096         def recursMenus(menuname):
00097             """recursive function to add the rest of the menu widget."""
00098             # menuname is a two items like [Tkinter.Menu_Instance, [cascade_members]]
00099            
00100             for j in menuname[1]:
00101                 if len(j) == 2: # simple item j[0] is the label of the menu item; j[1] - various options
00102                     
00103                     # consider the possibility of separators:
00104                     if j[0] == "Separator" and j[1][0][1] == "Separator":
00105                         menuname[0].add_separator()
00106                     else: 
00107                         # unpack the options and names (j[1]) into a dictionary like this: 
00108                         # {"name": strvalue, "callback": strvalue, "accelerator": strvalue, "icon":strvalue}   
00109                         attr={}
00110                         for i in j[1]: attr[i[0]]=i[1]
00111                         try:
00112                             self.img.append(ImageTk.PhotoImage(Image.open(os.path.join(self.iconspath, attr["icon"]))))
00113                             menuname[0].add_command(label=attr["name"], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image=self.img[-1], command=functools.partial(eval(attr["callback"]), self.master), accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00114                         except:
00115                             menuname[0].add_command(label=attr["name"], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image="", command=functools.partial(eval(attr["callback"]), self.master), accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00116                         del attr
00117                 else: # must be a MenuSubDir (j[2] contains the items in the MenuSubDir)
00118                     j[0]=tkinter.Menu(menuname[0])
00119                     # unpack the options and names (j[1]) into a dictionary like this: 
00120                     # {"name": strvalue, "callback": strvalue, "accelerator": strvalue, "icon":strvalue}   
00121                     attr={}
00122                     for i in j[1]: attr[i[0]]=i[1]    
00123                     try:        
00124                         self.img.append(ImageTk.PhotoImage(Image.open(os.path.join(self.iconspath, attr["icon"]))))  
00125                         menuname[0].add_cascade(label=attr["name"], menu=j[0], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image=self.img[-1], accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00126                     except:
00127                         menuname[0].add_cascade(label=attr["name"], menu=j[0], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image="", accelerator=attr["accelerator"]) 
00128                     del attr  
00129                     recursMenus([j[0], j[2]])
00130  
00131         for i in self.menus: 
00132             recursMenus(i)
